Plans & Pricing


How much does CaseWare Cloud cost?


Single User Plan

R100

per month

or R1200 per year (Billed Annually)

Office Plan

R250

per month

or R3000 per year (Billed Annually)

Standard features included:
  • 1 Individual user login
  • 5GB Storage**
  • Entity, staff and contact management
  • Working Papers Integration (requires SmartSync licence)
  • CaseWare Time Integration (requires Time Desktop)
  • Unlimited portal access for your clients
  • Daily Backups
Standard features included:
  • 5 Individual user logins
  • 25GB Storage**
  • Entity, staff and contact management
  • Working Papers Integration (requires SmartSync licence)
  • CaseWare Time Integration (requires Time Desktop)
  • Unlimited portal access for your clients
  • Daily Backups
Additional users: R50 per month (incl. additional 5GB storage)

** Additional storage: R50 per 5GB billed monthly
